author: Amanda Blankenship
title: Travis Kelce Gave Fan A Concussion During Golf Tournament
text:
By Amanda Blankenship July 25, 2024 News Katie Hauss set out to enjoy a day of watching some of her favorite celebrities golf at the American Century Championship on July 12. Among the list of celebs present was Travis Kelce . What she didn’t expect was for the NFL player to send a golf ball straight into the back of her head. Here’s what happened.
Katie Hauss Got Knocked Down By Travis Kelce’s Golf Ball Without any warning, Katie said that she felt something hit the back of her head. “When I got hit, I immediately felt pain,” she told People . At that point, she said she was “trying to focus on not blacking out.”
“I didn’t really know what had happened,” Katie admitted. “I then heard people start yelling and screaming that it was Travis Kelce’s golf shot, and ‘Oh my god, that girl just got hit in the head.’”
The 37-year-old looked to her husband, Ryan Griffiths, for support. She told him that she believed she was okay, but that the site where the golf ball hit her just hurt. “Then when I put my hand to my head there was a lot of blood,” Katie recalled.
Instagram/Katie Hauss Griffiths Then, she said that a “Good Samaritan” stepped forward to help. The person applied pressure to the wound on her head and instructed her to stay still as they called in EMTs to their location. “I am just so appreciative to that man for helping me, a complete stranger, and I wish I could thank him for his kindness,” she said.
Travis Kelce and his brother Jason were among the celebrities golfing that Friday. It was, in fact, Travis’ golf ball that struck the back of Katie’s head.
No Hard Feelings Between Katie & Travis After realizing what went down, Travis and Jason made their way over to make sure Katie was okay. “Travis must have walked down as I was still on the ground,” she said. “I just remember seeing him come up and then I don’t remember exactly what he said, but he asked if I was ok. I could tell that he felt really badly.”
The NFL joked and said that the least he could do was take a photo with the woman. Katie said that she stood up and joked that the front of her looked all right for photos.
“Travis said that he couldn’t bring himself to smile given the circumstances,” she said. “I honestly felt bad for him, because I know that it was a total accident, and that can’t feel good to do that with a huge crowd looking on.”
Katie also remembered that Travis Kelce’s brother, Jason, seemed to be really worried about her. He asked her if she was okay a number of times.
When EMTs arrived, they realized Katie’s head had been split open. They suggested that she go to the hospital to make sure nothing serious happened as a result of the knock on her head. In the emergency room, she received several stitches and doctors confirmed she had a concussion.
An episode of the “ New Heights ” podcast didn’t age well. Prior to Jason and Travis Kelce making their way to the tournament, Travis joked, “Don’t feel bad if you hit somebody because they bought the ticket.”
However, there are no hard feelings on Katie’s behalf. She says that she still can’t believe the entire ordeal happened.
Author Recent Posts Amanda Blankenship Amanda Blankenship is an overcaffeinated wife and mother. When she's not reading or writing, you can find her watching reality TV or a good, juicy drama series. author: Brianna Mowery
title: Weather Impact Alert: More high heat forecasted for Friday
text: The News 19 Weather Team has issued a Weather Impact Alert Day for Friday, as we could see another day of potentially dangerous heat levels. A heat advisory was issued Thursday as heat index values, or "feels like temperatures," stayed in the triple digits. The chance for dangerous heat index values will return for Friday. High temperatures combined with high dew points could lead to heat index values reaching near 110 degrees Friday. Another heat advisory could be issued by the National Weather Service for the Midlands. The chance for isolated afternoon showers and storms stays lower for Friday. Any storms that do develop on Friday could be strong to severe, with the potential for damaging winds. Storm chances are expected to increase over the weekend. On both Saturday and Sunday, storms are more likely and could be more scattered. Heat Safety Tips - Stay Hydrated and Cool: Drink plenty of fluids and stay in an air-conditioned room. Avoid being outside in the sun for extended periods. Check on relatives and neighbors to ensure they are safe and comfortable. - Protect Children and Pets: Never leave young children or pets in unattended vehicles. Car interiors can reach deadly temperatures within minutes. - Outdoor Precautions: When outside, wear lightweight and loose-fitting clothing. Try to limit strenuous activities to the early morning or evening. Be alert to signs of heat exhaustion and heat stroke, and act immediately if symptoms appear. - Workplace Safety: The Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) advises taking frequent rest breaks in shaded or air-conditioned areas during outdoor work. If the heat has affected someone you are around, move them quickly to a cool, shaded area. A heat stroke is a medical emergency; call 911 immediately.

author: CMS Medios
title: Hombre es detenido por hacerse pasar por policía en la CDMX
text:
México|
Hombre es detenido por hacerse pasar por policía en la CDMX
El sujeto se hacía pasar por elemento de la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana, pero debido a una denuncia anónima fue detenido por la policía capitalina
Este viernes, la Secretaría de Seguridad Ciudadana (SSC), anunció la captura de un hombre de 58 años quien se hacía pasar por integrante de la policía de la Ciudad de México. El sujeto circulaba por calles de la alcaldía Venustiano Carranza vestido con un uniforme institucional y a bordo de una motocicleta que portaba emblemas oficiales.
ADEMÁS: ¿Cuánto cuesta casarse en la CDMX este 2025?
La intervención fue realizada por agentes de la Dirección General de Asuntos Internos, quienes atendieron una denuncia anónima que alertó sobre la presencia de un supuesto policía en actitud sospechosa.
Al verificar su identidad, los oficiales constataron que no formaba parte del cuerpo de seguridad capitalino. El detenido fue puesto a disposición de las autoridades correspondientes, mientras se investiga si utilizó su disfraz para cometer otros actos ilícitos
[#BoletínSSC]|[#DETENIDO]| Oficiales adscritos a la Dirección General de[#AsuntosInternos], de la[#SSC]de la[#CiudadDeMéxico], detuvieron a un hombre que portaba un uniforme con insignias, así como una motocicleta con logotipos de esta Institución, sin poder identificarse como…[pic.twitter.com/tXKLI1qAcM]— SSC CDMX (@SSC_CDMX)[April 9, 2025]
Un supervisor de seguridad privada de una plaza comercial reportó que una motopatrulla se encontraba estacionada en un sitio prohibido sobre la calle Oriente 158, en la colonia Moctezuma Segunda Sección, obstruyendo el paso peatonal.
Al confrontar al conductor, este reaccionó de manera prepotente y afirmó ser policía, argumentando que podía estacionarse en cualquier lugar. Ante la situación, elementos de Asuntos Internos acudieron al lugar, donde localizaron una motocicleta gris con insignias oficiales, frente a una sucursal bancaria.
Además, también hallaron a un hombre vestido con uniforme policial, quien afirmó ser oficial de la SSC y estar realizando labores de vigilancia en la zona bancaria.
LEE: Portaplacas y todos los accesorios por los que puedes recibir una multa en CDMX
Sin embargo, al solicitarle una identificación oficial y datos de su adscripción, el sujeto presentó documentación con vigencia hasta 2024. Al verificar sus datos en el Sistema de Información Administrativa de la Secretaría, se confirmó que no pertenecía a la corporación, ni se encontró registro de su estatus o área de adscripción.
El hombre fue detenido y se le leyeron sus derechos, mismo que fue puesto a disposición del agente del Ministerio Público correspondiente, junto con la documentación apócrifa y la motocicleta, la cual también portaba una placa de circulación presuntamente falsa.

author: PA News Agency
title: Woman believed to be held hostage in Gaza declared dead | South Wales Argus
text: A hard-hit Israeli kibbutz has announced the death of Judih Weinstein — an American-Canadian-Israeli woman who had been thought to be held hostage in Gaza. The news came six days after Ms Weinstein’s husband, Gad Haggai, was also declared dead. Ms Weinstein, 70, and Mr Haggai, 73, were taking an early morning walk near their home in Kibbutz Nir Oz on the morning of October 7 when Hamas militants burst across the border into Israel, killing about 1,200 people and kidnapping 240 others. In the early hours of the morning, Ms Weinstein was able to call emergency services and let them know that both she and her husband had been shot and send a message to her family. Ms Weinstein and her husband had been thought to be among the hostages still held in captivity in Gaza. But six days ago, the kibbutz announced that Mr Haggai was killed on October 7 and his body was taken to Gaza. On Thursday, the kibbutz said it had learned that Ms Weinstein was also killed on October 7 and her body is also being held in Gaza. It was not immediately clear how Israeli authorities determined their deaths. The couple are survived by two sons and two daughters and seven grandchildren, the kibbutz said. US President Joe Biden said he was “devastated” to learn of Ms Weinstein’s death, especially after hearing about the couple during a meeting with their daughter. The families “have been living through hell for weeks. No family should have to endure such an ordeal”, he said in a statement. Ms Weinstein was born in New York and was an active member of Kibbutz Nir Oz, a small community near the Gaza border where she taught English to children with special needs. The kibbutz said she also taught meditation techniques to children and teenagers who suffered from anxiety as a result of rocket fire from Gaza. Mr Haggai was a retired chef and jazz musician. “Judy dedicated her life to serving others, spending years teaching English and using her passions for poetry, puppeteering, and mindfulness to empower children of all backgrounds,” her family said in a statement. In a YouTube video made during a brief round of fighting between Israel and the Islamic Jihad militant group last May, Ms Weinstein read a series of poems and expressed hope for better days ahead. “I truly hope that the next time I’m recording some Haiku it won’t be under duress, under rocket fire, under conditions where people are at war,” she said. “May we all be granted the right to our basic rights of home, food, shelter and peaceful days. Here’s hoping.” Al Haggai, one of the couple’s sons, told Israel’s Channel 13 that the family had originally hoped their mother’s multiple citizenships would allow her to be released during the week-long ceasefire in late November, when 105 hostages were let go. Almost all were women and children. He said that when his mother’s name was not on any of the daily lists, he started to suspect that something had happened to her. According to Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu’s office, at least 23 of the approximately 129 hostages believed to be held in Gaza have either died or been killed in captivity. Nir Oz was one of the hardest-hit Israeli communities on October 7, with roughly a quarter of its residents killed or kidnapped. The families of missing hostages have drawn widespread support and sympathy in Israel as they press the government to reach a new ceasefire deal to bring home their loved ones. Mr Netanyahu met on Thursday in Tel Aviv with some of the families, where he told them there were behind-the-scene efforts to bring the hostages home, according to a statement from his office. “I can’t elaborate on the details, we are working to return everyone,” he said. author: Sara Aquino
title: Tras incendio en la plataforma Cherne-1, Petrobras sufre suspensión cautelar - CPG Click Petroleo e Gas
text:
Incendio en la plataforma Cherne-1 lleva a IBP a suspender inspecciones de Petrobras en la Cuenca de Campos; La unidad ha estado funcionando durante 40 años, el doble de su vida útil esperada.
Un incendio reciente en Plataforma Cherne-1, ubicada en la Cuenca de Campos dos Goytacazes (RJ), llevó al Instituto Brasileño de Petróleo y Gas (IBP) a suspender, como medida cautelar, el Sistema de Gestión de Inspección de Equipos (SPIE) de Petrobras en la Unidad de Negocio de la Cuenca de Campos (UN-BC).
La medida, aunque temporal, impone restricciones inmediatas a las operaciones de la empresa estatal hasta que se determinen las causas del accidente, cuya gravedad ha reavivado las discusiones sobre la integridad estructural de las unidades offshore que han excedido su vida útil diseñada.
La estructura de la plataforma Cherne-1 supera el límite operativo seguro
Los informes técnicos preliminares indican que la plataforma Cherne-1, diseñada originalmente para operar durante 20 años, ya ha estado en funcionamiento durante cuatro décadas, el doble del tiempo previsto.
-
Margen Ecuatorial podría garantizar US$200 mil millones a Brasil, dice Ineep
-
TechnipFMC firma contrato con Petrobras para desarrollar un ducto resistente a la corrosión en el presal
-
Brava Energia aumenta producción a 82 mil barriles de petróleo
-
Una vasta infraestructura mueve mil millones de barriles de petróleo en el Puerto de Açu
Esta discrepancia entre la vida útil prevista y la realidad operativa es una de las preocupaciones centrales del comité técnico que investiga el accidente.
Se está analizando exhaustivamente el deterioro estructural de la unidad, con foco en posibles fallas que pudieron haber contribuido al incendio.
Mientras tanto, el IBP exige a Petrobras un plan de acción correctiva para recuperar la certificación completa.
IBP aplica suspensión con base en estándares técnicos
De acuerdo con el punto 4.16 de las directrices que regulan el SPIE, la suspensión cautelar Se puede determinar siempre que ocurre un accidente importante, como el registrado en Cherne-1.
La medida fue adoptada de acuerdo con el dictamen de la Comisión de Certificación (ComCer), que deliberará sobre el mantenimiento del certificado entre el 13 y el 15 de mayo.
El punto 11.5 de la norma también establece que el certificado SPIE debe permanecer suspendido hasta que se presente un informe de investigación concluyente al Organismo de Certificación de Producto (OCP).
La decisión final de ComCer también considerará la información remitida por los órganos supervisores del Ministerio de Trabajo y Empleo (MTE).
Petrobras mantiene rutinas operativas y seguridad a bordo
En un comunicado oficial, Petrobras informó que la suspensión cautelar “es una medida administrativa y no impacta las actividades de inspección y mantenimiento ya en marcha en la plataforma”.
La empresa reforzó que se siguen cumpliendo las rutinas establecidas “para mantener las condiciones de habitabilidad y seguridad de Cherne I, de acuerdo con la normativa vigente”.
Además, la empresa estatal destacó que fue notificada formalmente por el IBP y que espera la conclusión del informe de investigación para las deliberaciones de ComCer.
Tres trabajadores permanecen hospitalizados en condición de salud estable
El incidente también dejó personas heridas. Según Petrobras, tres trabajadores permanecen hospitalizados, bajo seguimiento clínico, y su estado de salud se considera estable.
El caso de la plataforma Cherne-1 refuerza la necesidad de una mayor supervisión de las estructuras envejecidas en el sector del petróleo y el gas.
La continuidad de las operaciones en plataformas que exceden su vida útil sin modernizaciones adecuadas pueden suponer riesgos crecientes.

author: archyde
title: Mind Over Magic: Create Your Ideal Magic School - Early Access Now Available on Steam! - Archyde
text: 2023-12-28 09:44:54 The new simulation game “Mind Over Magic” developed by Sparkypants and published by Klei Publishing is now open for early access on Steam. In this game, players will serve as the principal of a magic school and build a magic school from scratch. The ideal magic school. The gameplay of this game is similar to “Hypoxia”. In this fantasy magic world, players create a magic academy by arranging “rooms” and carry out the most important educational work to train students to explore underground mazes so that they can survive in the terrifying world. Survive the creatures. In “Mind Over Magic”, students need to study according to the schedule you set every day, and the teachers are also personally selected by you. As students delve into various magical subjects, they will gradually discover their true potential. The scenes of “Mind Over Magic” are presented in 3D, so the layout of each room and the battles between students and magical creatures, as well as ancient secrets, strange plants, mysterious potions, undead servants, etc. are all fantastic. The settings all come to life. Players who are interested in this game can purchase it on Steam for early access! 1703814460 #Steam #Academy #Dark #Magics #Mind #Magic #open #early #access #4Gamers

author: Just Jared
title: Who Is Joe Flacco's Wife? He's Married to Dana Grady!
text:
Who Is Joe Flacco's Wife? He's Married to Dana Grady!
Joe Flacco has been lighting it up as the quarterback for the Cleveland Browns after the NFL team started off the season with some quarterback woes.
Now, the veteran star, who won a
Super Bowl with the Baltimore Ravens after the 2012 season, is taking the field tonight during Thursday Night Football to try and continue his hot streak. As you’re watching, you may be wondering if Joe is married or dating anyone.
Well, he’s been married to
Dana Grady since 2011!
The pair actually grew up in the same area and went to high school together in the Camden County, New Jersey area.
Keep reading to find out more…
Joe and Dana have five kids together, Stephen, Daniel, Francis, Evelyn, and Thomas. They’re all born between 2012-2018. Evelyn is their only daughter, and once, when asked about what it was like finally welcoming a baby girl into the family, Joe
said, “It was definitely different. Seeing a girl come out after three boys was a bit of a shock. Everybody is beyond overjoyed, beyond pumped.”
Not much is known about Dana‘s personal life at this time.
Dana Flacco, Joe Flacco
